title: Cashbased maternal health interventions can improve childho
author: Prabal K De; Laxman Timilsina
description: Childhood vaccination has lagged in countries like India, despite its demonstrated positive effects on health outcomes like infant mortality. At the same time, many conditional cash transfer programs
